brandGuidance.style: Illuminated manuscript meets storybook illustration. Warm, painterly, noble.
brandGuidance.format: 16:9 aspect ratio, designed for full-screen chapter transitions
brandGuidance.characters: Finn (otter warrior) must be consistent across all plates - same face, outfit, blade
brandGuidance.tone: Quiet courage, not bombastic heroism. The calm before action, not the action itself.
brandGuidance.framing: Slight vignette, aged parchment texture at edges, subtle decorative borders

prompt.scene: Finn's cottage at dawn, the moment of departure
prompt.composition: Cottage in warm morning light, door open, Finn's silhouette on the threshold looking toward the sunrise road. Willow trees, river in background.
prompt.finn: Back to viewer, travel pack shouldered, Otterblade visible on back. Posture shows determination mixed with reluctance to leave.
prompt.lighting: Golden hour, warm light on cottage, cool mist on the road ahead
prompt.mood: Bittersweet departure, answering the call, leaving home for duty
prompt.decorative: Subtle vine border at edges, aged parchment texture in corners
prompt.text_area: Lower third clear for chapter title overlay

prompt.scene: Finn on the River Path, first glimpse of Willowmere
prompt.composition: Finn walking along willow-lined riverbank, looking up. Willowmere Hearthhold visible through the trees - ancient stone walls, towers with banners.
prompt.finn: Three-quarter view, travel-worn, wonder on his face, one paw touching a carved waystone
prompt.lighting: Afternoon sun filtering through willow canopy, god rays, golden-green tones
prompt.mood: Anticipation, arriving at destiny, wonder at the ancient sanctuary
prompt.decorative: Willow branches framing the edges, subtle Celtic knotwork border
prompt.style: Storybook illustration, depth through atmospheric perspective

prompt.composition: Finn standing at the foot of the old stone bridge, massive gatehouse looming before him. Lanterns lit despite daylight. Faded banners stirring.
prompt.finn: Small against the imposing gate, but standing tall. Hand on sword hilt (not drawn), ready for judgment.
prompt.lighting: Transition lighting - warm lanterns against cooler stone, threshold moment
prompt.mood: Testing, being judged, the moment before acceptance
prompt.decorative: Stone archway framing, iron bands echoed in border design
prompt.style: Storybook illustration, emphasis on scale - small hero, great doorway

prompt.scene: Finn before the Everember in the Great Hall
prompt.composition: The vast Great Hall, Everember blazing at center. Finn approaching the fire, Elder Badger waiting beside it. Tapestries on walls, vaulted ceiling lost in shadow.
prompt.finn: Approaching the fire, bathed in golden light from below, face showing awe and resolve
prompt.lighting: Warm firelight dominating, candles on pillars, deep shadows above
prompt.mood: Sacred moment, taking an oath, understanding what must be protected
prompt.decorative: Tapestry-edge framing, medieval illumination style borders
prompt.style: Storybook illustration, cathedral-like reverence, warm throughout

prompt.scene: Finn in the Archives, studying the ancient map
prompt.composition: Spiral library tower interior, great map table in center. Finn bent over the map, Owl Librarian perched nearby. Candles, dusty tomes, scrolls.
prompt.finn: Leaning over map, one claw tracing a route, expression of concentration and growing concern
prompt.lighting: Warm candlelight, dust motes in light beams from high windows
prompt.mood: Discovery, the weight of knowledge, planning for what's coming
prompt.decorative: Scroll and book motifs in border, ink-stained parchment texture
prompt.style: Storybook illustration, scholarly atmosphere, intimate scale

prompt.scene: Finn descending into the Deep Cellars
prompt.composition: Stone staircase spiraling down into darkness. Finn at the top, torch in one paw, the Otterblade drawn. Roots breaking through ceiling, damp stones.
prompt.finn: Lit from his own torch, casting long shadows, determination overcoming fear visible in posture
prompt.lighting: Single torch source, deep shadows, hints of movement in the darkness below
prompt.mood: Tense descent, facing fear, the unknown waiting below
prompt.decorative: Root and stone motifs, darker border with subtle danger hints
prompt.style: Storybook illustration, chiaroscuro lighting, NOT horror

prompt.scene: Finn rallying the defenders in the Kitchen Gardens
prompt.composition: Sunlit courtyard, Finn standing on a low wall addressing gathered woodland creatures. Mice, squirrels, a young badger - all with simple weapons. Training dummies, herb gardens visible.
prompt.finn: Standing tall, Otterblade raised (not threatening, but as a symbol), expression of earnest leadership
prompt.lighting: Bright afternoon sun, hopeful clear light, banners visible against blue sky
prompt.mood: Hope rising, community gathering strength, the power of standing together
prompt.decorative: Banner and herb motifs, warm summery border
prompt.style: Storybook illustration, communal and hopeful, many characters but Finn central

prompt.scene: Finn climbing toward the Bell Tower as the storm arrives
prompt.composition: Slate rooftops at dramatic angle, Bell Tower spire above. Finn climbing against fierce wind, cloak whipping. Storm clouds gathering, lightning in distance.
prompt.finn: Bracing against wind, determined expression, one paw reaching for the next handhold
prompt.lighting: Dramatic sunset breaking through storm clouds, orange and purple, wind-swept
prompt.mood: Urgency, elemental struggle, the climax approaching
prompt.decorative: Wind and bell motifs, storm-edge border
prompt.style: Storybook illustration, dynamic composition, dramatic atmosphere

prompt.scene: Finn on the ramparts, Zephyros descending from the storm
prompt.composition: Storm-battered battlements, Finn small but unbowed. Above, the massive silhouette of Zephyros descending through lightning. The Hearthhold visible below, Everember's glow fighting the dark.
prompt.finn: Blade drawn, stance ready, looking up at the descending storm hawk. Small but resolute.
prompt.zephyros: Silhouette only, massive wingspan, frost-touched armor glinting, descending like judgment
prompt.lighting: Lightning illumination, cold blues above, warm ember glow from below
prompt.mood: Ultimate confrontation, destiny manifest, warmth vs cold
prompt.decorative: Ice and fire motifs intertwined in border, dramatic contrast
prompt.style: Storybook illustration, epic scale, the moment before battle

prompt.scene: The New Dawn - victory celebration in the Great Hall
prompt.composition: Great Hall filled with life, dawn light streaming through tall windows. Finn by the Everember, surrounded by friends. The Elder Badger, the defenders, all the allies made along the way.
prompt.finn: Not centered/heroic, but among friends. Humble smile, medallion around neck, hand being shaken by a mouse. The hero as part of the community.
prompt.lighting: Golden sunrise mixing with warm firelight, radiant and peaceful
prompt.mood: Triumph, warmth restored, belonging, the promise of peace
prompt.decorative: Celebration motifs, sunrise rays in border, joyful
prompt.style: Storybook illustration, the final page, happily ever after
